text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder has come to the<n>seaside summer camp
along with the<n>other Tracen Academy students.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, to train right after waking up<n>each day—it doesn't get
any better<n>than this.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Summer camp is a valuable<n>opportunity, and I intend to
make the<n>most of it.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'm glad you're here with me. Let's<n>get to work. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, our summer training camp<n>begins...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... I cannot seem to...run at my best...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I'm going to run one more<n>lap... I'm not yet
satisfied... with my<n>results...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't seem to be reaching the<n>goals she's set for
herself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But at this point, her form seems to<n>be worsening from
exhaustion. Any<n>more and she's likely to get injured...
choice_data_list: Actually, we should call it a day.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: No, I'm fine... I can still run...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I... have to train—

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Understood. Then I'll head back to my<n>room. Good day,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taking it much better than I thought<n>she would, Grass
Wonder heads back<n>to the lodge.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Later that night...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer, there you are.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I'd heard there's a summer festival<n>nearby, so I came to
invite you. Would<n>you like to join me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I thought she'd be frustrated about<n>not training more, but
she seems like<n>her usual calm self.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Heehee, festivals are a staple of<n>summer in Japan, so we
can get an<n>appreciation for the culture there.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I find quiet places more desirable for<n>taking walks, but
festivals have their<n>own unique, vibrant mood.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah, look at this. They have whole<n>candied watermelons. I
trust you<n>haven't spoiled your appetite?
choice_data_list: I can't eat a whole watermelon!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Haha, that was merely in jest. We<n>can still have fun without
getting<n>carried away.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As we wander around the many<n>stalls, Grass Wonder
suddenly stops<n>in front of the shooting gallery.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ah, look at that kitty plushie. It's<n>adorable.

text_block_list.name: Shooting Gallery Staff
text_block_list.text: You've a good eye, miss. Care to test<n>your skills?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: You know what... Trainer, I'm going to<n>try for it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The normally peaceful Grass Wonder<n>holds a rifle at the
ready. I'm so<n>engrossed at the unusual sight<n>when...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Pew! Dink...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I did it! In a single shot, no less. ♪

text_block_list.name: Shooting Gallery Staff
text_block_list.text: What a hit! Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thank you! ...Now then, I still have<n>some shots left.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Pew! Dink... Pew! Dink...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh my, look at all these stuffed toys.

text_block_list.name: Shooting Gallery Staff
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm blown away. You got every<n>prize in one go... You some
kinda<n>hitman?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I'm nothing so sinister. I simply<n>have a steady hand,
thanks to the<n>inner harmony I maintain. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
What fun we had at the festival. ♪<n>Even at training camp,
it's vital to<n>relax sometimes.
choice_data_list: You sure you wouldn't rather be running?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, a part of me would, yes.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
As you know, I don't like to yield or<n>relent, so I've no
intention of<n>compromising on my goals.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But I'm only able to be so stubborn<n>because I have a
trainer like you to<n>support me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You're the only one who insists that I<n>stop when I truly
need to stop.
choice_data_list: I'll always be here to help you.
I'll always be here to help you.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
And I'll always run with all my heart.<n>So, be it summer camp
or whatever<n>lies ahead, you have my complete<n>trust.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, I decide to respond to<n>Grass Wonder's
dedication by giving<n>her a brand new training scheme that<n>
works the entire body instead of just<n>her legs.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Phew... I've finished the<n>long-distance swimming.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I see you've incorporated some<n>water training to keep the
impact off<n>my legs.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But... wait. Was that the last set? How<n>strange—I still have
plenty of energy to<n>run.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer, did you make a mistake with<n>the schedule?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"To speak without words"... You<n>always understand me
better than<n>anyone, hehe. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If I want to help Grass Wonder be her<n>best, it looks like I'll
need some<n>extraordinary speed of my own to<n>keep up.
